trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de progresso do Windows contido em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripProgressBar is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> optimized for hosting in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar é o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>otimizado para hospedagem em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the ToolStripProgressBar level, but the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is fully accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um subconjunto de eventos e propriedades do controle hospedado são expostos no nível de ToolStripProgressBar, mas subjacente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle é totalmente acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A ToolStripProgressBar control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation.
trans-unit.target: Um controle ToolStripProgressBar visualmente indica o progresso de uma operação demorada.

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripProgressBar control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses.
trans-unit.target: O controle ToolStripProgressBar exibe uma barra que preenche da esquerda para a direita com o sistema de cor de realce como uma operação progride.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ToolStripProgressBar control can only be oriented horizontally.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ToolStripProgressBar o controle só é possível orientado na horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripProgressBar control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents.
trans-unit.target: O controle ToolStripProgressBar normalmente é usado quando um aplicativo executa tarefas como a cópia de arquivos ou impressão de documentos.

trans-unit.source: Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue.
trans-unit.target: Os usuários de um aplicativo podem considerar um aplicativo sem resposta se não há nenhuma indicação visual.

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripProgressBar to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding.
trans-unit.target: Use o ToolStripProgressBar para notificar o usuário que o aplicativo está executando uma longa de tarefa e se o aplicativo ainda está respondendo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedades definem o intervalo de valores para representar o progresso de uma tarefa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is typically set to a value of zero, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor de zero e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade normalmente é definida como um valor que indica a conclusão de uma tarefa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property could be set to the total number of files to be copied.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para exibir o progresso corretamente ao copiar um grupo de arquivos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade pode ser definida como o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade representa o progresso que fez o aplicativo para concluir a operação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the ToolStripProgressBar only approximates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property's current value.
trans-unit.target: Como a barra exibida no controle é uma coleção de blocos, o valor exibido pelo ToolStripProgressBar apenas aproxima o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>valor atual da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on the size of the ToolStripProgressBar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property determines when to display the next block.
trans-unit.target: Com base no tamanho do ToolStripProgressBar, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade determina quando exibir o próximo bloco.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the ToolStripProgressBar other than changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Há várias maneiras de modificar o valor exibido pelo ToolStripProgressBar diferente alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify a specific value to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property by, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade para especificar um valor específico para incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método para incrementar o valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: To vary the increment value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and specify a value by which to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para variar o valor de incremento, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>método e especifique um valor pelo qual incrementar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripProgressBar replaces the older <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar substitui o antigo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>controle, que, mesmo assim, é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to 100, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade é definida como 0, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade será definida como 100 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>estiver definida como 10.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> class with specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de plano de fundo exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento entre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> e itens adjacentes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> valor que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura e largura do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> em pixels.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> value representing the height and width.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> valor que representa a altura e largura.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Increment method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount.
trans-unit.target: O método de incremento permite que você incrementar o valor da barra de progresso em uma quantidade específica.

trans-unit.source: This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método de incrementar a barra de progresso é semelhante ao uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade especifica a posição atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método de incremento, os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método de incremento com um valor negativo especificado no `value` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.
trans-unit.target: O valor pelo qual incrementar a barra de progresso da atual posição.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> display update, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o atraso entre cada <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref> exibir a atualização, em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: The MarqueeAnimationSpeed property gets or sets the delay of display update.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MarqueeAnimationSpeed obtém ou define o intervalo de atualização da exibição.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, as you decrease the value of the MarqueeAnimationSpeed property, the speed of the animation increases.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, como você diminuir o valor da propriedade MarqueeAnimationSpeed, aumenta a velocidade da animação.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o atraso, em milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite superior do intervalo que está definido para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Maximum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade máximo é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Maximum property, the progress bar is completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>é igual ao valor da propriedade máximo, a barra de progresso é completamente preenchida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be set to (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property or using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> methods) to indicate that an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para especificar um valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade deve ser definida (definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade ou usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>métodos) para indicar que uma operação é concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the value of the Maximum property to the total number of files in a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode definir o valor da propriedade máximo para o número total de arquivos em uma operação de cópia de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Each time a file is copied, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied.
trans-unit.target: Cada vez que um arquivo é copiado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade pode ser aumentada por um até que o número total de arquivos é copiado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled.
trans-unit.target: Nesse ponto, a barra de progresso deve ser totalmente preenchida.

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o limite superior do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 100.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o limite inferior do intervalo que está definido para este <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade especifica o limite inferior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Minimum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da propriedade mínimo é alterado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>controle é redesenhado para refletir o novo intervalo de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Minimum property, the progress bar is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>é igual ao valor da propriedade mínimo, a barra de progresso está vazia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the progress bar, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o valor da barra de progresso, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>método, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>método, ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o limite inferior do intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Subscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Assina os eventos do controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The control from which to subscribe events.
trans-unit.target: O controle de qual assinar eventos.

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a inscrição eventos de controle hospedado.

trans-unit.source: The control from which to unsubscribe events.
trans-unit.target: O controle dos quais cancelar a assinatura de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*> property.
trans-unit.target: Avança a posição atual da barra de progresso pela quantidade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*>

trans-unit.source: The PerformStep method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformStep incrementa o valor da barra de progresso com o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade para especificar a quantidade que cada tarefa concluída em uma operação altera o valor da barra de progresso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver copiando um grupo de arquivos, você talvez queira definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>1 e o valor da propriedade a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade para o número total de arquivos a serem copiados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the PerformStep method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando cada arquivo é copiado, você pode chamar o método PerformStep para aumentar o valor da barra de progresso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser ter um controle mais flexível, o valor da barra de progresso, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>método ou defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade especifica a posição atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método PerformStep, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é maior que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se, depois de chamar o método PerformStep com um valor negativo especificado no `value` parâmetro, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>propriedade permanece no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a strongly typed accessor for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: Este é um acessador fortemente tipado para este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> object associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref> objeto associado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> layout é direita para esquerda ou da esquerda para direita quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the RightToLeftLayout property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RightToLeftLayout para controlar o layout de aplicativos internacionais, em que o idioma é escrito da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: When the RightToLeftLayout property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade RightToLeftLayout é `true`e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, espelhamento será habilitado no posicionamento de formulário e de controle do Windows e o texto será da direita para esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para ativar o espelhamento e definir o layout do controle da direita para a esquerda quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref> está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which to increment the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor pelo qual incrementar o valor atual de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*>método é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the incremental amount.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o valor incremental.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> has a Text property, no text is shown on the control.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>tem uma propriedade de texto, nenhum texto é exibido no controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the display text.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa o texto de exibição.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor atual de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Value property must be in the range specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de valor deve estar no intervalo especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the current value.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o valor atual.
